text: The Belgium national under-16 and under-17 basketball team is the national representative for Belgium in international under-16 and under-17 basketball tournaments. They are administered by Basketball Belgium. The team competes at the FIBA U16 European Championship, with the opportunity to qualify for the FIBA Under-17 World Cup. ==See also== *Belgium national basketball team *Belgium national under-19 basketball team ==References== ==External links== *Official website *FIBA profile Category:Basketball in Belgium Category:Basketball teams in Belgium Category:National under-16 basketball teams Category:National under-17 basketball teams Basketball
title: Belgium men's national under-17 basketball team
